tutorials.title: Lab 100: Getting Started with Oracle Analytics Cloud Data Visualization
tutorials.description: Learning how to provision an OAC instance. Getting acclimatized to the DV interface.

tutorials.title: Lab 200:  Analyzing Sales - Basic Introduction to Core Features
tutorials.description: Creating projects with data sets and visualizations. Understanding the visualization capabilities of DV. Telling a story with annotated visualizations.

tutorials.title: Lab 300:  Analyzing Social Media with Sales – Data Blending and Wrangling
tutorials.description: Learning to Wrangle Data Sets. Joining Multiple Data Sets for analysis.

tutorials.title: Lab 400: Analyzing Social Media with Sales – Visualize and Narrate
tutorials.description: Learning how to use Calculations. Using different visualizations to obtain insights from data set. Narrating a meaningful story using Narrate

tutorials.title: Lab 500: Predicting Subscriptions - Machine Learning
tutorials.description: Learning how to create data flows. Using the Machine Learning abilities of OAC.
